wikipedia_page.main:
Linda Hooks (born Liverpool, Lancashire, 1952) is a British actress, model and beauty queen who won the Miss International crown in 1972, three years after Valerie Susan Holmes earned the title.
She won Miss International 1972 as "Miss Britain" then competed in Miss United Kingdom 1974, failing to make the final 15. During the mid-1970s, she appeared regularly on Anglia Television as an assistant to Nicholas Parsons in the British version of the popular quiz show Sale of the Century. 
As an actress, she appeared in three of the later Carry On films: Carry On Dick, Carry On Behind and Carry On England. On television, apart from several appearances in the Carry on Laughing series, she appeared in two episodes of the sci-fi drama Space: 1999 and an episode of The Sweeney.

response: * Two actresses playing background Darians, Linda Hooks and Jenny Cresswell, would make subsequent appearances in the series:  Hooks (Miss International of 1972)Linda Hooks Wikipedia Article would be cast in the remounted scenes of "The Last Enemy" as a member of Dione's glamorous crew; Cresswell (Miss Anglia of 1969)Jenny Cresswell actor profile; Space: 1999 website 'The Catacombs', Martin Willey would appear throughout the second series as a background extra.
